gov.va.med.srcalc.vista.vistalink

Class VistaLinkProcedureCaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.med.srcalc.vista.vistalink.VistaLinkProcedureCaller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VistaProcedureCaller

    public class VistaLinkProcedureCaller
extends java.lang.Object
implements VistaProcedureCaller
    Provides a simple interface to call VistA Remote Procedures. Uses VistALink.

    • Field Summary

      static java.lang.String RESULT_TYPE_ARRAY

      • VistaLinkProcedureCaller

        public VistaLinkProcedureCaller(java.lang.String division)
        Constructs an instance for the given VistA division (e.g., 500).
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if VistALink is not configured properly
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given division is not known

        Description copied from interface: VistaProcedureCaller
        Performs a Remote Procedure Call.
        Specified by:
        doRpc in interface VistaProcedureCaller
        Parameters:
        duz - the calling user's DUZ
        procedure - the remote procedure to call
        args - the remote procedure arguments, if any The only valid types for arguments are String and Map
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of String lines from the response
